headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for devices using the miot protocol
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [README](https://github.com/merdok/homebridge-miot#platform-configuration-fields)

ip.title: Device ip address
ip.description: The ip address of the device.

deviceId.title: Device id
deviceId.description: The device id of the device.

model.title: The device model
model.description: The model of the device. If specified then the accessory will be created instantly without the need to first discover and identify the device.

prefsDir.title: Prefs directory
prefsDir.description: The location where to store device information. Default is: ~/.homebridge/.xiaomiMiot

pollingInterval.title: Background polling interval
pollingInterval.description: How often to check the status of the device in seconds.

deepDebugLog.title: Enable deep debug log
deepDebugLog.description: Enables additional more detailed debug log. Useful when trying to figure out issues with the plugin.

buzzerControl.title: Buzzer control service
buzzerControl.description: Whether to show buzzer control buttons.

ledControl.title: Led control service
ledControl.description: Whether to show led control buttons.

horizontalSwingControl.title: Horizontal swing control service
horizontalSwingControl.description: Shows an additional switch to quickly enable/disable horizontal swing mode.

verticalSwingControl.title: Vertical swing control service
verticalSwingControl.description: Shows a switch to enable/disable vertical swing mode.

naturalModeControl.title: Natural mode control service
naturalModeControl.description: Whether to show a switch which allows to quickly enable/disable the natural mode.

sleepModeControl.title: Sleep mode control service
sleepModeControl.description: Whether to show a switch which allows to quickly enable/disable the sleep mode.

horizontalMoveControl.title: Horizontal move control service
horizontalMoveControl.description: Whether to show switches which allows to move the fan left or right.

verticalMoveControl.title: Vertical move control service
verticalMoveControl.description: Whether to show switches which allows to move the fan up or down.

fanLevelControl.title: Fan level service
fanLevelControl.description: Show fan level switches which allow to change the fan level.

ioniserControl.title: Ioniser control service
ioniserControl.description: Show a switch which allows to quickly enable/disable the ioniser on your fan.

shutdownTimer.title: Shutdown timer service
shutdownTimer.description: Show a slider (light bulb) to control the auto shutdown timer.

horizontalAngleButtons.title: Horizontal angle buttons
horizontalAngleButtons.description: Allows to create buttons that can switch between horizontal oscillation angles.

childLockControl.title: Buzzer control service
childLockControl.description: Whether to show a child lock control button.

screenControl.title: Screen control service
screenControl.description: Whether to show screen dim/brighten control button.

dryModeControl.title: Dry mode control service
dryModeControl.description: Whether to show a dry mode control button.
